reason.raw: There's outstanding issues with the DRCVehiclePlugin that I'd prefer to resolve before changing these parameters.
reason.html: There's outstanding issues with the DRCVehiclePlugin that I'd prefer to resolve before changing these parameters.

description.raw:
There appeared to be a bug with the polaris when used with the DRCVehiclePlugin controller ([drcsim issue 103](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issue/103)), but it appears to have been caused by astronomical friction values at the wheels. The vehicle was starting to slip and the high friction would cause it to stop completely. Reducing the wheel friction to 1.0 prevents the sudden stops, and introduces more realistic wheel slip.

I also raised polaris c.g. height to an estimated 0.4 m, since it was at ground level.
